title: Music for LoL (Login Screen ) - "Astriferous"

embed.description: Season 3 Login Screen - League of Legends.

body:
I'm currently studying at the Australian Institute of Music in Sydney which for the first half of the year, I majored in Composition and Music Production, and learned to compose using production software as opposed to by previous acoustic ways. During the holidays, I have been working on a piece that I submitted as one of the assessments for the course. A few people told me it reminded them of a video game OST - I immediately thought of the various music used in League of Legend's log-in screens and wished one day I would be able to compose something worthy enough to be featured on one. It has been a dream and goal of mine to have my creativity featured in passions I enjoy, specifically gaming - and I absolutely adore the various music composed for this game.    

As a little test, I chose a previous log-in screen and uploaded my music with it (as linked in this discussion). Feel free to listen, and I appreciate feedback. 

Note: (If you're not a fan of long build-ups, listen from 2:05).

{{champion:37}} 

Thanks!

replies.body: I can honestly say I enjoy this. Excellent work!

As someone still experimenting, I am not asking people to purchase my music. 
You can download it here on my SoundCloud:
 https://soundcloud.com/aurawrah/astriferous

Thanks!
Ok, but when you do finally release some stuff, let me know so I can spread word, maybe get you played on radio!
